channel.title: station on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in station on Barefoot Rob

item.title: shaking with anger
item.description: 13:10 Thursday 05 October 2017 JST written 21:59 Thursday 05 October 2017 JST Still fucking shaking with anger. I saw an old man grab a woman's ass just as her train arrived. He tried to run so I grabbed him and brought him back to her. She was like thank you and got on the train! Yo lady don't leave me hanging with this fucker; he grabbed your ass. so I yelled at him and let him go, never to see her again and a bunch people wondering wtf crazy barefoot mf yelling about.
